Read our review guidelines

  • Show:
  • Sort By:
  • Anonymous
  • Australia, Couple, 25-30
  • Novice Nomad
  • 3 reviews
16th Oct 2017
7.7

Would have given this place a 10 although the walls in the hotel are very thin could hear drunk girls yelling and slamming doors at 3 in the morning. Street side is a little loud also. Staff are great, good location right near la rambla and metro Rooms are very small but okay for 1-2 people.

    • 10.0Value For Money
    • 8.0Security
    • 8.0Location
    • 6.0Facilities
    • 10.0Staff
    • 4.0Atmosphere
    • 8.0Cleanliness
  • Anonymous
  • New Zealand, Couple, 25-30
  • Novice Nomad
  • 9 reviews
4th Oct 2017
8.6

Our room was very small, with one side of the double bed pushed up to a wall and only enough access to walk around the other side. The bathroom was small but very clean and modern. Although we weren't next to the roadside we found the room to be extremely noisy, with other guests coming in at all hours past our room. There were tea and coffee making facilities which was really nice and the staff were amazing! Very central and close to the metros. Thanks for your hospitality!

    • 8.0Value For Money
    • 10.0Security
    • 8.0Location
    • 8.0Facilities
    • 10.0Staff
    • 6.0Atmosphere
    • 10.0Cleanliness
  • Anonymous
  • USA, Male, 31-40
  • Avid Traveller
  • 14 reviews
18th Sep 2017
10.0

This was one of the better hostels I have ever stayed in, and i have stayed in a lot! Extremely friendly front desk person, and the room and whole building were all up to date with modern everything but still kept the old feeling and flair of the building. I will definitely book this place again when I visit Barcelona.

    • 10.0Value For Money
    • 10.0Security
    • 10.0Location
    • 10.0Facilities
    • 10.0Staff
    • 10.0Atmosphere
    • 10.0Cleanliness
  • Anonymous
  • Canada, Female, 18-24
  • Novice Nomad
  • 4 reviews
20th Aug 2017
8.6

Had a fantastic stay at this hostel. Is it very nicely decorated, clean, and the AC works well. It is in a great location, only minutes from Las Ramblas. The staff is kind and helpful. Would stay here again!

    • 10.0Value For Money
    • 8.0Security
    • 8.0Location
    • 8.0Facilities
    • 8.0Staff
    • 8.0Atmosphere
    • 10.0Cleanliness
  • Anonymous
  • England, Female, 31-40
  • Novice Nomad
  • 1 review
19th Jul 2017
8.9

Small but functional room. The set up works well and was all we needed for a short stay in Barcelona. The guesthouse is nicely decorated and room very clean. The location was only a few minutes walk from the las Rambles.

    • 8.0Value For Money
    • 8.0Security
    • 10.0Location
    • 8.0Facilities
    • 10.0Staff
    • 8.0Atmosphere
    • 10.0Cleanliness
  • Anonymous
  • England, Couple, 25-30
  • Novice Nomad
  • 2 reviews
2nd Jul 2017
8.6

We enjoyed our stay at BCN, our room was bright, clean and had a vintage touch. Check in was straight forward despite us arriving after reception had closed. Staff were friendly and efficient, and the hostel felt secure despite not having 24 hour staff. The location is within walking distance of all the main attractions and transport. We had a street facing room with a balcony, this was a little too noisy at night with bars and bin men emptying glass bins at all hours! Would stay again though!

    • 8.0Value For Money
    • 8.0Security
    • 10.0Location
    • 8.0Facilities
    • 8.0Staff
    • 8.0Atmosphere
    • 10.0Cleanliness
  • Anonymous
  • USA, Female, 25-30
  • Avid Traveller
  • 14 reviews
10th Jun 2017
7.7

We ended up leaving early! Would have rated it higher if there had not been maintainence work going on next to our room. There was a shuttered window in our room that opened into a central area of the building. After having stayed out til 2 the night before, we woke up at 8:30 AM to drills, hammering, and loud voices directly on the other side of this window (as if they were in our room) two mornings in a row, followed by them painting, meaning there were paint fumes in our room too.

    • 4.0Value For Money
    • 10.0Security
    • 10.0Location
    • 8.0Facilities
    • 4.0Staff
    • 8.0Atmosphere
    • 10.0Cleanliness

title: Reviews of BCN Home Guest House in Barcelona
